## Bundle.IBundleLoaderCreateParams.hashNormalizer property

Optional hash normalizer for verifying checksums. If not provided, a CRC32 normalizer will be used for browser compatibility. Must match the normalizer used during bundle creation.

**Signature:**

```typescript
hashNormalizer?: Hash.HashingNormalizer;
```
